snippet: Waka Flocka Flame seemed an outlier when he first came on the hip-hop scene three years ago; now it looks as though he may have carved out a niche that others, like Chief Keef, can join.
abstract: Rapper Waka Flocka Flame has carved out a new niche in rap, an unpolished approach full of rowdy boasts and wordplay.
lead_paragraph: Waka Flocka Flame seemed an outlier when he first came on the hip-hop scene three years ago; now it looks as though he may have carved out a niche that others, like Chief Keef, can join.

headline.seo: Raw Rap: Waka Flocka Flame and Chief Keef
headline.main: The Newest Rap: Intense, Authentic and Accidental
headline.print_headline: The Newest Rap: Intense, Authentic And Accidental
